products.title: Cobham Coat Wallet
products.body_html:
Bremont’s Cobham Coat Wallet includes eight credit card compartments, two full length pockets for ample note storage and two large sections to stow additional documents. The wallet features blind Bremont logo and propeller embossing and is crafted from deluxe calf and English bridle leather, guaranteeing excellent quality.

Made in England, the Cobham Coat Wallet approximately measures a width of 10.7cm by 18.3cm height, sizes may vary marginally.

See how this product is made in our film below.

products.title: Chichester Pocket Wallet
products.body_html:
Bremont’s Chichester Pocket Wallet includes four credit card compartments and two supplementary sections to stow folded notes and additional documents. The wallet features blind Bremont logo and propeller embossing and is crafted from deluxe calf and English bridle leather, guaranteeing excellent quality.

Made in England, the Chichester Pocket Wallet approximately measures a width of 8.5cm by 10.5cm height, sizes may vary marginally.

See how this product is made in our film below.

products.title: MB Barrel Cufflinks - Bronze
products.body_html:
Bremont’s circular MB Barrel Cufflinks feature the knurled barrel design as seen on the popular MB and U-2 wrist watches.

The MB Barrel Cufflinks are made from a strong combination of aluminium and stainless steel whilst the new T-bar fitting ensures ultimate functionality.

products.title: Pin Buckle - Titanium
products.body_html: The titanium pin buckle features a highly polished bevel and signature Bremont logo engraving.

products.title: Pin Buckle - Stainless Steel
products.body_html: The brushed stainless steel pin buckle features a highly polished bevel and signature Bremont logo engraving.

products.title: Pin Buckle - Polished Stainless Steel
products.body_html: The polished stainless steel pin buckle features a highly polished finish and signature Bremont logo engraving.

products.title: Pin Buckle - DLC
products.body_html: The DLC coated stainless steel pin buckle features a highly polished bevel and signature Bremont logo engraving.

products.title: NATO Strap - Khaki
products.body_html:
Khaki NATO strap with Velcro fastening, featuring a hand-stitched Bremont logo.

Handmade in England and designed for ultimate functionality, the Bremont NATO strap features a simple fail-safe method to keep the watch secure in the event a spring bar breaks or detaches.

The strap is made from durable nylon and features leather keepers with a stainless steel loop.

View our Strap Sizing Guide here

products.body_html:

Handmade in England and designed for ultimate functionality, the Bremont NATO strap features a simple fail-safe method to keep the watch secure in the event a spring bar breaks or detaches.

The strap is made from durable nylon and features leather keepers with a stainless steel loop.

products.title: Hip Flask
products.body_html: Bremont’s 4oz stainless steel Hip Flask is hand covered using fine English leather to promise a luxurious feel. The hunter green, kidney shaped flask features signature embossing and a hinged screw top, making it practical for all outdoor pursuits and adventures. Bremont’s Hip Flask measures a width of 9.8cm by 9.4cm height, sizes may vary marginally. Please note that our flask is suitable for cold drinks only.

products.title: Bremont Invictus Games UK Team Supporters Bracelet
products.body_html:
Limited production collector's edition.

We are immensely proud to be an official supporter of the UK Team for the Invictus Games. We marked the partnership by creating bespoke Bremont bracelets for each of the 90-strong team and have now created a collector’s edition.

Bremont supports the UK Team via Help for Heroes and will donate 100% of profits of the sale price of each Bracelet to Help for Heroes Trading Limited which Gift Aids all its taxable profits to Help for Heroes (Registered Charity Number 1120920). We expect to donate at least £15,000.

Bremont are fortunate to have had the opportunity to work extensively with the military, designing and manufacturing watches for squadrons all over the world. The opportunity to honour those who have served our country in this way is something we are very proud to do.

Bracelet measurements: Medium: 18.5cm

Leather band and polished stainless steel disc
products.product_type: Invictus Games UK Team Supporters Bracelet

products.title: NATO Strap - Grey Canvas
products.body_html:
Grey Canvas NATO strap.

A modern variation of the military staple 'G10' NATO strap but with a vintage look. Designed for ultimate functionality with a simple fail-safe method to keep the watch secure in the event a spring bar breaks or detaches.

Should you require a pin buckle for your NATO strap, you can purchase this here.

products.title: Pocket Square - Red
products.body_html: Bremont’s Pocket Square by Turnbull & Asser subtly features our signature circular propeller logo to create a timeless polka-dot print. The finely patterned square is framed by a plain hem finish and can be teamed with Bremont’s Tie to perfect a polished look. Made in England, Bremont’s Pocket Square by Turnbull & Asser is woven from 100% English silk and approximately measures 45cm by 45cm square, sizes mary vary marginally.

The finely patterned tie is woven from 100% English silk and can be teamed with Bremont’s Pocket Square to perfect a polished look. Made in England, Bremont’s Tie by Turnbull & Asser approximately measures a width of 8cm, sizes may vary marginally.
